lex.text: Elliot See was born in Dallas on July 23rd 1927. He graduated from the University of Texas at Austin which is affiliated to the university of texas system. Elliot See died in St.Louis.

modifiedtripleset.mtriple: William_Anders | was a crew member of | Apollo_8

sentence.striple: William_Anders | was a crew member of | Apollo_8

lex.text: William Anders was born on October 17, 1933, in British Hong Kong. He graduated from AFIT in 1962 with an M.S., and would go on to serve as a fighter pilot, and as a crew member on Apollo 8. Anders retired on September 1, 1969.

sentence.striple: William_Anders | was a crew member of | Apollo_8

references.reference: in 1962 from AFIT with a M.S .

lex.text: William Anders was born on the 17th of October 1933 in British Hong Kong. He graduated in 1962 from AFIT with a M.S. and went on to become a fighter pilot and a crew member on Apollo 8 before he retired in 1969.

sentence.striple: William_Anders | was a crew member of | Apollo_8

references.reference: in 1962 from AFIT with a M.S

lex.text: William Anders was born in 1933 in British Hong Kong and graduated in 1962 from AFIT with a M.S. He then went on to become a test pilot and joined the Apollo 8 crew before he retired in 1969.
